next.title: JavaScript Function Invocation #11
next.author: Iris Chew
next.excerpt: JavaScript variables can belong to the local or global scope.Global variables can be made local (private) with closures.

next.title: JavaScript Function Closures #10
next.author: Iris Chew
next.excerpt: The code inside a function is not executed when the function is defined.The code inside a function is executed when the function is invoked. It is common to use the term "call a function" instead of "invoke a function".
